tool.name: synthesisimager
tool.description: synthesisimager is an tool that accomplishes synthesis processing. A {\tt synthesisimager} must be constructed for each MeasurementSet for which one wishes to do processing. Multiple copies of {\tt synthesisimager} may be made at any time (provide they are given different names).

method.name: synthesisimager
method.description: This is used to construct {\tt synthesisimager} tool.

param.name: selpars
param.description: All parameters that control selection within one MS

method.name: tuneselectdata
method.shortdescription: reselect the data to match image definition

param.name: impars
param.description: All parameters that control image coordinate system definition

param.name: gridpars
param.description: All parameters that control ftmachines and gridding parameters

method.name: setdata
method.shortdescription: Select data from one MS via conventional parameters (in lieu of selectdata)
method.description: Select data from one MS. Call this function in succession if there are multiple MSs.

param.name: freqbeg
param.description: Starting frequency/velocity/channel as a string with units. If spw is also supplied, the intersection will be used

param.name: freqend
param.description: End frequency/velocity/channel as a string with units.

param.name: freqframe
param.description: Frequency frame in which freqbeg and freqend are specified.

param.name: usescratch
param.description: Use scratch column (True) or virtual records (False) for model data

param.name: readonly
param.description: Open the MS in readonly mode. No model data will be written.

param.name: incrmodel
param.description: Subtract existing model data and start with residuals

method.name: setimage
method.shortdescription: Define the image coordinate systems and types via conventinal parameters in lieu of defineimage
method.description: Define the image coordinate systems and shapes.

param.name: nx
param.description: Total number of spatial pixels in x

param.name: ny
param.description: Total number of spatial pixels in y

param.name: phasecenter
param.description: Direction of phase center as a diretion measure or a field id

param.name: nchan
param.description: Number of channels; a -1 (default) means all the channels as selected in selectvis and combined into one continuum channel

param.name: freqstart
param.description: Start channel; A 0-relative channel number of the spwid or a frequency quantity or a velocity quantity or radial velocity measure

param.name: freqstep
param.description: Step in channel; integer for number of channels or frequency quantity or velocity quantity or radial velocity measure

param.name: restfreq
param.description: rest frequency to use; default =\> use the one available in ms

param.name: facets
param.description: Number of facets on each axis

param.name: ntaylorterms
param.description: Number of terms for a spectral Taylor expansion

param.name: reffreq
param.description: Reference Frequency of the image. Also used in the Taylor expansion.

param.name: distance
param.description: Distance to object: usually ignore this! (m)

param.name: freqframe
param.description: Frequency frame in which freqstart and freqstep are specified.

param.name: trackdir
param.description: Name of moving source, e.g planet or moon, to keep fixed in image

param.name: overwrite
param.description: Overwrite the image if it exists (true)

param.name: startmodel
param.description: Starting model ( image name or component list name )

param.name: aterm
param.description: Set the antenna aperture tmer (aterm) on/off

param.name: psterm
param.description: Set the Prolate Spheroidal term (psterm) on/off

param.name: wbawp
param.description: Set usage of the wide-band A-Projection algorithm

param.name: cfcache
param.description: Name of convolution function disk cache

param.name: usepointing
param.description: Control application of the pointing correction

param.name: pointingoffsetsigdev
param.description: Control application of the pointing correction for heterogenous array allowing for antenna pointing group identification using this parameter. The parameter has a significant cost on the memory used for gridding. Please utilize it wisely.

param.name: dopbcorr
param.description: Control normalization of the raw image by the model PB

param.name: computepastep
param.description: Increment in PA after which re-computation of the GCFs is triggered. 360.0 implies compute GCFs for only the first PA value encountered in the MS.

param.name: rotatepastep
param.description: Increment in PA after which trigger in-memory rotation of the GCF nearest to the current PA value in the CF cache.

method.name: setweighting
method.shortdescription: Set parameters to control weighting during imaging

param.name: usecubebriggs
param.description: Use per channel weight density calculation for Briggs style weighting

method.name: apparentsens
method.shortdescription: Calculate apparent aggregate sensitivity in the selected visibilities

method.name: fillcfcache
method.shortdescription: Fill a potentially blank CFCache held inside the AWProject-class FTMachines.

param.name: cfcpath
param.description: Path to the CFCache on the disk

param.name: conjbeams
param.description: Use WB A-Projection algorithm (use frequency-conjugate beams)?

method.name: reloadcfcache
method.shortdescription: Re-load the CFCache, the name of which should already be set in the tool.

param.name: controls
param.description: All parameters that control major cycle

method.name: makeimage
method.shortdescription: calculate images of different type by gridding
method.description:
This tool function actually does gridding (and Fourier inversion if needed) of visibility data to make an image. It allows calculation of various types of image: \begin{description} \item[observed] Make the dirty image from the DATA column ({\em default}) \item[model] Make the dirty image from the MODEL\_DATA column \item[corrected] Make the dirty image from the CORRECTED\_DATA column \item[residual] Make the dirty image from the difference of the CORRECTED\_DATA and MODEL\_DATA columns \item[psf] Make the point spread function \item[singledish] Make a single dish image \item[coverage] Make a single dish or mosaic coverage image \item[holography] Make a complex holography image (experimental)
\end{description}

param.name: model
param.description: In case of multifield which image

method.name: unlockimages
method.shortdescription: release some images attached to this process
method.description: Try to unlock images if the need arise

param.name: imagefieldid
param.description: which image or outlier to unlock

method.name: estimatememory
method.shortdescription: Get an estimate in kilobytes of memory that will be needed
method.description: This function returns an estimate of the memory (RAM) to be used by sythesisimager tool. Need to be run after functions setdata and defineimage are done

method.name: getweightdensity
method.shortdescription: Save natural gridded wt to disk.

method.name: setweightdensity
method.shortdescription: Load the gridded weight density into image weighting generation
method.description: Load the gridded weight density into image weighting; useful in parallel when weight density is combined into one image and loaded in each process. if no imagename is passed the imagename.weight is loaded

param.name: type
param.description: name of image holding combined weight density
